KYE-R.BK.long_name: Kang Yong Electric Public Company Limited
KYE-R.BK.summary: Kang Yong Electric Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes household electrical appliances in Thailand, Japan, and internationally. The company offers home electrical appliances, such as refrigerators, electric fans, ventilating fans, water pumps, and jet towels under the Mitsubishi Electric name. It also exports its products to approximately 20 countries. The company was formerly known as Kang Yong Electric Manufacturing Co., Ltd. Kang Yong Electric Public Company Limited was founded in 1964 and is based in Bang Phli, Thailand.

TSR-R.BK.summary: Thiensurat Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes water purifiers in Thailand. It also distributes air conditioners, water filters jugs, electric appliances, and other equipment, as well as offers personal and auto title loans. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.
